name: First 2D Platformer
description:
First 2D Platformer

This game is my second game I created a long ago but I recently decided to publish it here to implement a sort of "Portfolio" helping with my applications to video game studios.

It shows a 2D platformer very basic where I discovered a lot of new concepts around video game development, etc...

I hope you'll enjoy it !

Feel free to give me some advices for future games !
